text: rbna 'iiniy 'askant min dhuriyati bwad lays fih zare wala ma'an bjwar baytik almhrm, rabana 'iinani faealt dhlk bamrk; likay ywdu alsalat bhdwdha, fajeal qulub bed khalaqak tanze 'iilayhim wthnnu, warzuqhum fi hadha almakan min 'anwae althmar; likay yshkru lak ealaa eazim nemk. fastajab allah dea'h
